title: S2 Ep2: Why we vote for protectionism
itunes:title: Why we vote for protectionism
description: It blows the minds of economists when voters choose protectionist policies that, they point out, make most of them poorer. Gene Grossman tells Tim Phillips how trade models can explain this, if they incorporate insights from other social sciences.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
